author: Special Correspondent
text:
Charles Lobo, Chief Post Master General (CPMG), Tamil Nadu Circle, Chennai, paid a visit to the Salem East and Salem West Division Head Post offices in the city and inspected the functioning of various facilities on Thursday.

Mr. Lobo, accompanied by Manju P. Pillai, Post Master General, Western Region, Coimbatore, visited the Salem East Head Post Office and Salem West Head Post Office and inspected the functioning of money order booking, registered post, speed post, and special savings scheme for girl children counters. The CPMG held discussion with P. Arumugam, Senior Superintendent of Post Offices, Salem East division, E.R. Palanisamy, Superintendent of Post Offices, Salem West region, and other officials.

The CPMG paid surprise visit to the Salem Railway Mail Service office, Hasthampatti Post Office and also the sub-post office in the hill station of Yercaud and inspected the various facilities.
title: Functioning of post offices inspected
